```{r}
#| label: setup
#| include: false
library(ggplot2)
library(squat)

#consecutive_id(c(TRUE, TRUE, FALSE, FALSE, TRUE, FALSE, NA, NA))
is_categorical <- function(x) {
  is.character(x) | is.factor(x)
}

gt_custom_theme <- function(gt_obj) {
  gt_obj |>
    gt::opt_stylize(style = 6, color = "gray") |>
    gt::fmt_number(columns = gt::where(is.numeric), decimals = 2) |>
    gt::fmt_number(columns = gt::where(is.integer), decimals = 0) |>
    gt::cols_align_decimal(
      columns = gt::where(is.numeric),
      dec_mark = ".",
      locale = "en"
    ) |>
    gt::cols_align(align = "left", columns = gt::where(is_categorical)) |>
    gt::tab_style(
      style = "vertical-align:top",
      locations = gt::cells_column_labels()
    ) |>
    gt::tab_options(quarto.disable_processing = TRUE)
}
```
